what is the meaning of "xtype: 'madeupName'" when defining a class
is it for later so that we can instantciate from the thing that we defined?
YES
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
is initComponent and constructor the same thing?
netsais use constructor
col sais use initComponent

what is this store: store
is it a xtype, but it's not a xtype
Ext.data.StoreView	store: store
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
when we require
we're saying these classes have to be loaded before instantiating this class
ok, loaded: definition or instantciation
definition
